long.am,ar,bn,ca,cs,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e:
Get my new tab and get different hd wallpapers in your custom start page.

Awe-Inspiring features:

> Weather widget.

> Set your own red and black shards wallpapers by uploading your own wallpapers as your new tab.

> Shuffle all red and black shards wallpapers, or just your favorite red and black shards wallpapers.

> Popular links widget.

> Time and date widget.

> Quick access to your google apps.

> Access 100+ of free games.

> Quick access to other themes.

> Breathtaking animation effects: slow motion, rain drops, rain and snow with each red and black shards tab.

> Save your favorite sites to the theme shortcut panel new tab. You can go to important and frequently visited websites with just one click.

> Easy to use search bar always visible on the middle of the screen.

> Auto-Hide widgets and wallpapers when your new tab is open and idle.

> Sticky notes and countdown widgets.

This newtab features some of the refreshing red and black shards backgrounds to brighten your day.

This red and black shards new tab created by fans and is not officially endorsed by or has any relationship with another entity.

Enjoy this new tab experience!!
